name: Adventure Awaits
description:
Thy land needeth thee, Adventurer. Monsters pour from the cracks in the world and ravage the lands. Our benevolent rulers seek heroes to restore order and peace to these trying times. Gather thy party and seek ye the almighty king and queen who shall guide thee on the critical tasks that lie ahead. The fate of these lands rest on thy shoulders...

Welcome to Adventure Awaits, a fully procedurally generated role playing game heavily inspired by the early games in the Ultima series (e.g. Exodus, Quest for the Avatar). After naming your party, you will enter a unique world where you will explore the main land, visit numerous towns, and explore dungeons while engaging in tactical turn-based combat.

Note that the demo version (free) is identical to the full release version. Supporting the full release version via purchasing is greatly appreciated!

Key features:

  • Old school fantasy role playing game with modern graphics and animations
  • Tactical turn-based combat where facing position is critical
  • Interact with townsfolk for quest guidance and to purchase all types of gear
  • Multi-level dungeons to explore
  • Level up party to grow stronger & acquire more powerful spells to take on tougher enemies
  • Endless replayability given procedural generation process of all maps, quests, and overarching story
